name: TheHughHewittShow
0:
”Alexa, play The Hugh Hewitt Show”
”Alexa, ask The Hugh Hewitt Show to play”
”Alexa, tell The Hugh Hewitt Show to play”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the hugh hewitt show
des: Hugh Hewitt is an American radio talk show host with the Salem Radio Network and a lawyer, academic, and author. A conservative and a Catholic, he comments on society, politics, and media bias in the United States. Visit www.hughhewitt.com for more.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
